name: Bitverse Blox
description:
WHAT'S NEW(since the last update)?

  • MAJOR CHANGES
    • Added Tad The Teddy Mouse, Peddington, Sergeant Sapp, Toast, and Barkey from the indie game Playroom PANIC! as Bits and myBits!
    • Added S.A.M from the ebook Captain Fluffybuns from the Unintelligible Galaxy as a Bit and myBit!
  • MINOR CHANGES
    • Fixed the myBit ability where it removed random Bits off the board!
    • Changed Mr. Radishpants(Chomper Chomp)'s myBit ability.
    • Fixed some text mistakes.
    • Fixed a bug where when buying a Present, sometimes you wouldn't get a myBit at all!

Join characters from every corner of the Bitverse as you play with your favorite game, TV show, movie, book, and internet characters! Get myBits in order to unleash devastating abilities onto the board! Play with your favorite characters from franchises like Chomper And Pals, Pretend Friends Adventures, Jordan's Horror Hooks, and so much more! What are you waiting for? Play this action-packed puzzle game today!
